committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: Authorizing the presentation of a program on the Capitol grounds in connection with National Physical Fitness and Sports Month.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the National Fitness Leaders Association, to present a program on the Capitol grounds, on May 2, 1992, in connection with National Physical Fitness and Sports Month to be known as the Great American Workout.

titles.title: Authorizing the presentation of a program on the Capitol grounds in connection with National Physical Fitness and Sports Month.
